Articles.Content: So I installed Kerbal Space Program a few moths sago, and it never updated to version 1.3 I've looked all over the internet to find a way to update it but i just can't. I have version 1.2.2 right now and really want to update to version 1.3 How do I update to away with words/ version 1.3?

Moving to Technical Support.

How did you purchase it? Steam? The KSP website? Elsewhere?
Then launch the Steam client and it will update the game unless you specifically opted in to a different version on the beta tab.

I didn't opt for a specific beta, it's set to "Opt out of all betas" And in the update section I have it set for always keeping this game up to date. So I don't know why it hasn't updated it's self yet. I don't see any options for forcing an update so how do I do this?
Try switching to any of the previous betas and right after the game is "updated" switch back to the default "Opt out of all betas" option
